title: Set the self-hosted instance timezone
content:
---
title: Set the self-hosted instance timezone
description: Change the default timezone for your self-hosted n8n instance.
contentType: howto
---

 Set the self-hosted instance timezone

The default timezone is America/NewYork. For instance, the Schedule node uses it to know at what time the workflow should start. To set a different default timezone, set GENERICTIMEZONE to the appropriate value. For example, if you want to set the timezone to Berlin (Germany):

You can find the name of your timezone here.

Refer to Environment variables reference for more information on this variable.
